I - GHOST Library

7. Polygon Mesh

gstTriPolyTriangular Poly Class.
gstTriPolyBaseBase class for triangular polygons.
gstTriPolyMeshImplements collection of triangular polygons that may or may not share vertices and edges.
gstTriPolyMeshBaseBase class for triangular polygons class.
gstTriPolyMeshHapticTriangle polygon scene graph node.
